<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Run the combiner over the entire worklist until it is empty.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns true if the IR is changed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl/#ac5d3cfa0755b34bcbd3f2298e9fa28ed">run</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Visitation implementation - Implement instruction combining for different</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction types.  The semantics are as follows:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return Value:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    null        - No change was made</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     I          - Change was made, I is still valid, I may be dead though</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   otherwise    - Change was made, replace I with returned instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl/#af616ac59efde7c61f6e8ff8bd80d2027">visitFNeg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/unaryoperator">UnaryOperator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// True when DB dominates all uses of DI except UI.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// UI must be in the same block as DI.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The routine checks that the DI parent and DB are different.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> dominatesAllUses(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;DI, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;UI,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Try to replace select with select operand SIOpd in SI-ICmp sequence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> replacedSelectWithOperand(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42;Icmp,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Classify whether a cast is worth optimizing.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is a helper to decide whether the simplification of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// logic(cast(A), cast(B)) to cast(logic(A, B)) should be performed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param CI The cast we are interested in.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return true if this cast actually results in any code being generated and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if it cannot already be eliminated by some other transformation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> shouldOptimizeCast(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/castinst">CastInst</a> &#42;CI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Try to optimize a sequence of instructions checking if an operation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// on LHS and RHS overflows.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this overflow check is done via one of the overflow check intrinsics,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// then CtxI has to be the call instruction calling that intrinsic.  If this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// overflow check is done by arithmetic followed by a compare, then CtxI has</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to be the arithmetic instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If a simplification is possible, stores the simplified result of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// operation in OperationResult and result of the overflow check in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// OverflowResult, and return true.  If no simplification is possible,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// returns false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizeOverflowCheck(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ac26154a24f393f523c87cc5f8239f36c">Instruction::BinaryOps</a> BinaryOp, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsSigned,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;CtxI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;OperationResult,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06c60fef11885eadbda4026c83ae9a13">OverflowResult</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return (a, b) if (LHS, RHS) is known to be (a, b) or (b, a).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, return std::nullopt</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently it matches:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - LHS = (select c, a, b), RHS = (select c, b, a)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - LHS = (phi &#91;a, BB0&#93;, &#91;b, BB1&#93;), RHS = (phi &#91;b, BB0&#93;, &#91;a, BB1&#93;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - LHS = min(a, b), RHS = max(a, b)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;std::pair&lt;Value &#42;, Value &#42;&gt;&gt; matchSymmetricPair(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ICI The icmp of the (zext icmp) pair we are interested in.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Take the exact integer log2 of the value. If DoFold is true, create the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nullptr on failure. Note, if DoFold is true the caller must ensure that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// takeLog2 will succeed, otherwise it may create stray instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
